LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.label: Phalanx
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.description: A cost-saving mass-produced variant specialized for urban combat scenarios, packed with assault armor and high mobility, makes it a fierce unit in close quarters.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Phalanx.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Protector.label: Protector
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Protector.description: Designed for peacekeeping operations and riot control needs, the Protector has overall strong armor around the entire frame, equipped with a huge flash shield and close quater weapons like batons or shotguns.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.label: Ronin
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.description: Humanoid mech model specialized for urban combat scenarios, packed with assault armor and high mobility, makes it a fierce unit in close quater.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Ronin.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.label: Siegebreaker
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.description: With better armor protection, the Siegebreaker stands in the heavily contested fronts of the battle line for sapping and breaching jobs, breaking through enemy defenses as the tip of the spear.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Siegebreaker.tools.head.label: head
